title_html: Learn to apply data and predictive analytics to meet business objectives

KDnuggets Home » News » 2016 » Apr » Courses, Education » Learn to apply data and predictive analytics to meet business objectives ( 16:n12 )

Learn to apply data and predictive analytics to meet business objectives

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: MS in Business Analytics, Online Education, Penn State

The Penn State World Campus online MPS in Data Analytics – Business Analytics Option curriculum focuses on exploring and analyzing large data sets to support data-driven business decisions. Apply by July 1 to take classes in August.



The Penn State World Campus online Master of Professional Studies in Data Analytics – Business Analytics Option curriculum focuses on exploring and analyzing large data sets to support data-driven business decisions. It covers the complete spectrum of analytics activities, including:

  • descriptive (what happened)
  • diagnostic (why it happened)
  • predictive (what will happen)
  • prescriptive (what should happen)

In addition to learning how to use optimization and forecasting techniques, you can take data management courses and learn about data mining for business intelligence. You can gain a practical skill set to perform tasks in various areas of business, such as marketing, supply chains, operations, forensics, and risk.

Learn More

Complete and submit your application by Friday, July 1, to start taking classes in August.

Contact wdadmissions@outreach.psu.edu to learn how this program can help you achieve your professional goals.

Penn State World Campus
Phone: 800-252-3592 (toll free within the United States)
Phone: 814-865-5403 (local and international)

The Pennsylvania State University
128 Outreach Building
University Park PA 16802

This communication is available in alternative media on request. Penn State is an equal opportunity, affirmative action employer, and is committed to providing employment opportunities to minorities, women, veterans, individuals with disabilities, and other protected groups. Nondiscrimination policy. 16-WC-1035/ajm/bjm
